content.rendered:
Mitigate Risk. Maximize Value.

“Private equity deals led by partners with prior operational experience, particularly in the restaurant industry, show greater improvement in inspection results than those led by partners with financial or banking resumes.”
Shai Bernstein
Professor of Finance, Stanford University

Competition for deals is heating up, especially in foodservice where valuation multiples can sit at 10x EBITDA and higher. This intensity might motivate some dealmakers to take an expedited path to closing, but a diligence process that surfaces red flags and identifies value-accretive actions is more necessary than ever.

The sophisticated nature of most restaurant and hotel food and beverage operations, which combine all the challenges of the retail sector with the complexities of manufacturing, logistics, and technology makes properly assessing investment targets more difficult — and more essential.

Without specialized knowledge of how consumers and the market are moving, a general due diligence assessment may remain focused solely on the top and bottom lines, rather than surfacing the factors that really drive performance. It’s not only about whether a target is in strong financial health, but also if it can compete effectively over the next 3-5 years.

Our services span from targeted analysis to fully integrated due diligence. On every project, we work to determine a target’s full potential and provide a clear post-acquisition strategy.

Why Our Clients Choose Us

A Trusted Due Diligence Partner
Industry Experience

Aaron Allen & Associates works exclusively in the foodservice industry, helping restaurant and hotel operators, foodservice tech companies, and investors find, size, and seize opportunities to maximize value creation. Our deep sector knowledge allows us to go beyond financial analyses and projections, uncovering the factors that will drive deal success.

Operational Expertise

We’re not theorists—we’re practitioners. Our team has worked across all functional foodservice areas from kitchens and host stands, to marketing departments, and supply chain management. We know how foodservice works, providing clients with invaluable insights into a target operation’s current state and future potential.

Boots-on-the-Ground Approach

A spreadsheet only goes so far in capturing how well a foodservice business is run. We leverage our industry expertise during site visits where we can evaluate day-to-day operations in order to surface obstacles to value creation and find opportunities to develop system efficiencies.

Cross-Border Practice

Our past and present clients have operations on six continents, giving us unparalleled experience in varied market conditions. We fuse this global exposure with local expertise, highlighting all the challenges and possibilities that come from a cross-border deal. Our regional knowledge and culturally aware approach also lends our clients the sensitivities and nuance sometimes necessary to complete complex cross-border transactions.

Holistic Approach

We believe that every aspect of a foodservice operation — from the menu, service, and brand down to the POS system, training procedures, and labor models — contributes to its market share and longevity. This holistic approach to the business means our clients understand risks and rewards of a deal early in the diligence phase, leading to sure-footed decision making and bullet-proof post-merger integration plans.

Prior Engagement Highlights

Commercial and Operational Due Diligence, Casual Dining Chain

Identified $180M in Value Creation Opportunities

$180M in Value Creation Opportunities Identified on CDR CDD/ODD

  • Developed interactive and dynamic what-if calculators for conservative, moderate, and ambitious scenarios
  • Conducted purchasing analysis for a trailing 36-month period to calculate theoretical versus actual food cost
  • Assessed validity of new concept expansion and value-creation
  • Provided go-forward recommendation followed by successful transaction

Due Diligence and Post-Merger Integration Support, Domestic QSR

Developed Strategies to Earn a 3X+ ROI through Repairs and Remodels Initiatives

Diligence and Post-Merger Integration Support

  • Approached target as turnaround opportunity for brand with historical relevance
  • Identified significant EBITDA inflation and unprofitable locations accounting for almost one-third of system
  • Prioritized CAPEX investments, from drive-thru optimization to remodeling and retrofitting initiatives
  • Highlighted most impactful OPEX investments, including performance measurement and management, QA/QC, and training

Buy-Side Advisory,
MENA Restaurant & Bakery

Identified and Quantified Value Enhancement Opportunities for a 3x–5x Return Over Holding Period

Value Enhancement Opportunities to Generate 3-5X Return

  • Performed deep analysis of Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, and Al Qasim markets to map expansion strategy and models
  • Conducted transaction-level data analysis to identify sales and cost patterns for unit- and brand-level variance analysis
  • Led a multilingual, qualitative research study to surface insights from current leadership
  • Developed models and rollout plans for home delivery
  • Accurately predicted sales downturn related to ill-advised changes made by target’s management team

Diligence and Portfolio Strategy, International Multi-Chain Operator

Identified value enhancement opportunities for a 3x return over the holding period

Developed Value Creation Plan for 3X Return Over Holding Period

  • Performed transaction-level sales analysis to identify patterns in average check size and trending performance
  • Reviewed purchasing department and supply chain practices to identify areas of risk and opportunity with regard to consolidation and expansion
  • Conducted brand audit to evaluate impact of significant closures
  • Corrected exaggerated margins and expansion projections from sell-side team
  • Highlighted potential post-merger management challenges

Put Our Global Know-How and Know-Who to Work

We help executive teams bridge the gap between what’s happening inside and outside the business to align their strategy with the forces reshaping the industry — ranging from market research and strategic planning to mergers & acquisitions and advisory services for both buy- and sell-side transactions.

Looking for advice on a restaurant transaction? Let’s get in touch.
